alert.note: Alert for Brown; Butler; Clermont; Hamilton; Warren (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 18 at 11:01AM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...SNOW SHOWERS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF KENTON...CAMPBELL...BOONE... HAMILTON...SOUTHEASTERN BUTLER...CLERMONT...NORTHWESTERN BROWN AND SOUTHERN WARREN COUNTIES THROUGH 1145 AM EST... At 1059 AM EST, snow showers were located along a line extending from South Middletown to near Cincinnati to Union, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 35 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Rapidly changing visibility will make travel difficult. Locations impacted include... Cincinnati, Hamilton, Middletown, Fairfield, Covington, Mason, Florence, Independence, Lebanon, Norwood, Forest Park, Erlanger, Fort Thomas, Newport, Sharonville, Monroe, Blue Ash, Loveland, Trenton, and Springdale. This includes the following Interstates... I-71 in Kentucky between mile markers 74 and 77. I-71 in Ohio between mile markers 0 and 33. I-74 in Ohio between mile markers 15 and 19. I-75 in Kentucky between mile markers 169 and 191. I-75 in Ohio between mile markers 0 and 31. Exercise extra caution while traveling. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
